question: What is the theme of 2018 World Oceans Day (WOD)?
option4: Preventing plastic pollution and encouraging solutions for a healthy ocean
answer: Preventing plastic pollution and encouraging solutions for a healthy ocean
explanation: The World Oceans Day (WOD) is a global day of ocean celebration and collaboration for a better future. It is observed every year on June 8 to provide an opportunity to take personal and community action to conserve the ocean and its resources. The 2018 conservation action theme is \"Preventing plastic pollution and encouraging solutions for a healthy ocean\".
